programme.subtitle: Play Time
programme.desc: Railway adventures. Famous opera singer Alicia Botti arrives on Sodor. Thomas is bubbling with pride when he is sent to take her to a grand concert.
programme.title: Thomas and Friends

programme.subtitle: Spring Wotty
programme.desc: DottyWot loses a bouncing competition, much to her disappointment. Maybe one of the animals in the zoo can help her to win next time?
programme.title: The WotWots

programme.desc: Animation. Who is going around the city hitting people on the head with a small, hard, round object? Max is determined to find out...
programme.title: City of Friends

programme.subtitle: Royal Roommate
programme.desc: Animated adventures. Bello helps the King combat his fear of the night when the Queen kicks him out of the castle due to his weird sleeping patterns.
programme.title: Jelly Jamm

programme.desc: Animated series. Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. On the way, Peppa's family get caught in a very long traffic jam.
programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.subtitle: Weeds
programme.desc: While Farm Girl and Piggy weed the overgrown potato patch, Leonard is at the seaside searching for pearls. But the seaweed he brings back is much more useful.
programme.title: Castle Farm

programme.desc: Regal larks. Little Princess and her friends go to the seaside. Everyone is disappointed to find the beach empty, and worse still it's raining!
programme.title: Little Princess

programme.subtitle: Visiting the Marigolds
programme.desc: Impish animation. Mishap follows mishap as everyone pays a visit to snooty King and Queen Marigold's castle.
programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom

programme.subtitle: Picnics
programme.desc: Mr Stubborn and Mr Fussy visit the beach despite the stormy weather, while Miss Daredevil chooses to go to the Moon with her picnic.
programme.title: Mr Men

programme.desc: A look ahead to today's children's programmes, including competitions and dedications.
programme.title: Milkshake

programme.subtitle: Percy and the Monster of Brendam
programme.desc: Train fun. On the island of Sodor, the fog is beginning to swirl into Brendam Docks. Percy is there, listening to one of Salty's tales!
programme.title: Thomas and Friends

programme.desc: Children's animated series. Noddy wants a pet and so he takes a chicken home. However, it proves harder to look after than expected.

programme.desc: Animation about a flower girl and her friends. The twins spot what they think is a fairy at the end of the garden.

programme.desc: Pig tales. Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets.
